iati-activity.title: One World Media Awards and Youth Jury
iati-activity.description: To encourage increased and better quality media coverage of development issues in order to increase UK public understanding of the causes of global poverty and how it can be tackled.

iati-activity.title: A Study Into Adaptation to and Mitigation of Climate Change in All DFIDS Current Projects (ADA Acc)
iati-activity.description: To understand what proportion of DFID ODA currently assists developing countries in tackling adaptation and mitigation and, to develop international thinking, by piloting comparing and identifying an effective methodology for measuring climate related ODA contributions for use in upcoming climate change negotiations

iati-activity.title: International Standards for Mining
iati-activity.description: To ensure that UK engagement on international standard setting for mining represents value for money - by doing an assessment of the likely impact of implementing different standards so that we focus resources on supporting international standards which can best help deliver economic growth and poverty reduction in developing countries.

iati-activity.title: Religion, Change and Development
iati-activity.description: To improve the policy and practices of faith groups and the UK govt by working more effectvely together in order to bring together leading development thinkers and representatives from faith groups to examine how to engage with the issue of religion as a dynamic in development, address tension points between secular and faith-based development organisations and identify ways of engaging as effectively as possible with communities / countries where faith has a pivotal role.
